errors.error_description: Installation command includes deprecated pydantic version that conflicts with v6.0 changelog stating library stopped using pydantic
Version compatibility issue where installation suggests pydantic 1.8.2 but changelog states library moved away from pydantic in v6.0
correction_candidates: Remove pydantic dependency as library no longer uses it in v6.0
Install both pydantic and msgspec dependencies
errors.golden_answer: Remove pydantic dependency as library no longer uses it in v6.0
